titles: Reasons humbly offer'd to the Honourable House of Commons, for continuing the duty or some part thereof, formerly granted for rebuilding St. Paul's Cathedral and other churches in London, for some time longer.
notes: Dated: Upon the Third of this instant February, 1695.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
